comments.creator: buddy@buddylindsey.com
comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.7; rv:9.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/9.0.1
Build ID: 20111220165912




Expected results:

I have some apps intalled, but I want to go to the app store to install more. My first inclination is to click on the Apps button in the addon bar to go to my dashboard. However, there is no link to the app store if I have apps installed. 

Would be nice if at the least at the bottom of the page there was something like "Get More Apps" and it links to app site.
comments.author: buddy@buddylindsey.com
